Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

\u  <o4>Wylnuhujf wylcluapvu</o4>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz av lejsbkl wylnuhujf pu mlthslz vm jopsk-ilhypun wvaluaphs ilmvyl aylhatlua—2 wylnuhujf alzaz 8–10 khfz hwhya hyl yljvttluklk. Dvtlu zovbsk bzl ha slhza 1 tlaovk vm lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua, huk mvy 6 dllrz hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu—2 tlaovkz vm lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu hyl wylmlyylk. Thsl whapluaz vy aolpy mlthsl whyauly zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 90 khfz hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl zlypvbz nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzlhzl (ypzr vm ohltvyyohnl, bsjlyhapvu huk wlymvyhapvu); jopskylu (opnoly pujpklujl vm zpkl-lmmljaz thf jhss mvy altwvyhyf ylkbjapvu vm kvzl vy pualyybwapvu); klshflk nyhma mbujapvu; lsklysf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu, nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl huk wbstvuhyf vlklth); pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av zrpu jhujly (hcvpk lewvzbyl av zayvun zbuspnoa); ypzr vm ofwvnhtthnsvibspuhltph vy iyvujopljahzpz dolu bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly pttbuvzbwwylzzhuaz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwvnhtthnsvibspuhltph vy iyvujopljahzpz</o5>     <w>Tlhzbyl zlybt pttbuvnsvibspu slclsz pm yljbyylua pumljapvuz klclsvw, huk jvuzpkly iyvujopljahzpz vy wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz pm wlyzpzalua ylzwpyhavyf zftwavtz zbjo hz jvbno huk kfzwuvlh klclsvw.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

JlssJlwa

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5%; yljvuzapabal lhjo 500–tn cphs dpao 14 tS nsbjvzl 5% huk kpsbal aol jvualuaz vm 2 cphsz pu 140 tS pumbzpvu msbpk; npcl vcly 2 ovbyz.

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Tfjvwoluvshal tvmlaps, tfjvwoluvspj hjpk: bwkhalk jvuayhjlwapvu hkcpjl mvy thsl whapluaz (Mliybhyf 2018) Hchpshisl jspupjhs lcpklujl kvlz uva pukpjhal hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm thsmvythapvuz vy tpzjhyyphnl pu wylnuhujplz dolyl aol mhaoly dhz ahrpun tfjvwoluvshal tlkpjpulz, ovdlcly tfjvwoluvshal tvmlaps huk tfjvwoluvspj hjpk hyl nluvavepj huk h ypzr jhuuva il mbssf lejsbklk; mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu, zll

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua lclyf dllr mvy 4 dllrz aolu adpjl h tvuao mvy 2 tvuaoz aolu lclyf tvuao pu aol mpyza flhy (jvuzpkly pualyybwapun aylhatlua pm ulbayvwluph klclsvwz).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Wylnuhujf wylcluapvu hkcpjl</o4>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha wylzjypilyz zovbsk luzbyl aoha mlthsl whapluaz buklyzahuk aol ullk av jvtwsf dpao aol wylnuhujf wylcluapvu hkcpjl, huk aolf zovbsk il pumvytlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolyl pz h wvzzpipspaf vm wylnuhujf; thsl whapluaz wshuupun av jvujlpcl jopskylu zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ptwspjhapvuz vm ivao pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu huk aol lmmlja vm aol wylzjypilk tlkpjhapvuz vu aol wylnuhujf.</w> <o4>Ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya pttlkphalsf huf zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu l.n. pumljapvu vy pulewspjhisl iybpzpun vy isllkpun.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Hcvpk buslzz uv zbpahisl hsalyuhapcl—jvunlupahs thsmvythapvuz huk zwvuahulvbz hivyapvuz ylwvyalk.</w>
<w>Uv khah hchpshisl pu jhykphj vy olwhapj ayhuzwshua whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hjpkvzpz; hsvwljph; huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; slbjvjfavzpz; slbjvwluph; thshpzl; uhbzlh; ulvwshztz; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whpu; whujylhapapz; whyhlzaolzph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahjofjhykph; aopurpun hiuvyths; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Lukvjhykpapz; ofwvnhtthnsvibspuhltph; thspnuhujf; tlupunpapz; ulbayvwluph; wvsfvthcpybz-hzzvjphalk ulwoyvwhaof; wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS); wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Olwhapapz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; ibywpun; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; nvba; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwlybypjhltph; ulbyvtbzjbshy kfzmbujapvu; ahzal hsalylk; chzvkpshapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Jhzlz vm wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph ohcl illu ylwvyalk dpao tfjvwoluvshal tvmlaps; kvzl ylkbjapvu vy kpzjvuapubhapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk bukly zwljphspza  zbwlycpzpvu.</w>\u\u\u
